programme.title: Project Runway All Stars
programme.desc: "Good Taste Tastes Good" - Diane von Furstenberg joins Angela to reveal the fastest challenge in Runway history. The top ten All Stars have only six hours to create a colorful look for supermodel Miranda Kerr.

programme.title: Project Runway All Stars
programme.desc: "Clothes Off Your Back" - The All Stars take to the streets of NYC to convince total strangers to part with their clothes in the name of fashion. Their muses' outfits are ripped apart and reborn in the hands of the All Stars.

programme.title: Project Runway All Stars
programme.desc: "Fashion Face Off" - The eight remaining All Stars compete head-to-head in a sportswear challenge for one of the four seasons. Cynthia Rowley guest judges.

programme.title: Project Runway All Stars
programme.desc: "Puttin' on the Glitz" - The award-winning composer of Wicked, Stephen Schwartz, challenges the All Stars to design an outfit for the Broadway musical Godspell.

programme.title: Project Runway All Stars
programme.desc: "O! Say Can You Sew?" - At the prestigious United Nations headquarters, Angela challenges the All Stars to choose flags as inspiration for beautiful dresses. Catherine Malandrino guest judges.

programme.title: Project Runway All Stars
programme.desc: "When I Get My Dress in Lights" - The remaining All Stars are confronted with their toughest challenge yet: use lighting technology to create an avant-garde design to be judged by music legend Pharrell Williams.

programme.title: Project Runway All Stars
programme.desc: "Let's Get Down to Business" - To determine which 3 All Stars make it to the finale, the designers get a lesson in the business of fashion. The winning outfit is produced by designer Nanette Lepore and sold nationwide for charity.

programme.title: Project Runway All Stars
programme.desc: "Finale Part 1" - The final 3 have just 4 days to create a signature collection. After a visit to Marie Claire headquarters and the arrival of some visitors to the workroom, Angela reveals the final All Stars twist.

programme.title: Project Runway All Stars
programme.desc: "Finale Part 2" - The moment of truth arrives for the final three All Stars as they present their signature collections to a VIP Runway show crowd. Guest judges include fashion icon Tommy Hilfiger.

programme.title: Project Runway All Stars
programme.desc: "Made in Manhattan" - All Stars designers return for the biggest season yet. Designers create collections inspired by NYC's uptown or downtown scene. Ivanka Trump guests.

programme.title: Project Runway All Stars
programme.desc: "The Art of Construction" - A construction site forces designers to create feminine fashion from masculine materials for the notorious Unconventional Materials Challenge. Snooki and JWoww join the judges.

programme.title: We All Fall Down
programme.desc: Our group seeks shelter with a survivalist family. Madison tries to uncover the family's true motives. Salazar works to uncover Strand's intentions.

programme.title: Talking Dead: Fear the Walking Dead 202
programme.desc: Kim Dickens, Lou Diamond Phillips & Lyndie Greenwood discuss the latest episode of Fear The Walking Dead. Host Chris Hardwick.

programme.title: Lone Star State with Sean Patrick Flanery
programme.desc: Norman Reedus and Sean Patrick Flanery saddle up and ride through the heart of Texas to hang out with influential tattoo artist Oliver Peck in Dallas.

programme.title: Inside The Walking Dead Season 6: Volume 3
programme.desc: Get an inside look from the cast and creators of the sixth season of The Walking Dead. Season 6, Episodes 11 to 16.

programme.title: Friday Night In with The Morgans: Episode 1
programme.desc: The Morgans check in with their friends Jensen Ackles and Danneel Ackles, Christian Serratos from The Walking Dead, plus their local family physician, all appearing via video chat.

programme.title: TS-19
programme.desc: Rick and the group are allowed into the CDC by a strange doctor. But not all is what it seems in their newly found haven.

programme.title: What Lies Ahead
programme.desc: Rick leads the group out of Atlanta. On the highway, they are stopped by a threat unlike anything they have seen before. The group searches for someone who has gone missing.

programme.title: Bloodletting
programme.desc: Coming to the aid of another, Rick discovers a possible safe haven. Shane must go on a dangerous mission to get badly needed medical supplies.

programme.title: Save the Last One
programme.desc: The group desperately awaits Shane's return. Shane finds himself trapped in a school, surrounded by the undead. Daryl and Andrea search for someone in the woods.

programme.title: Cherokee Rose
programme.desc: Rick negotiates with Hershel to let the group stay on the farm while the others settle in and must contend with an unusual threat. Glenn and a new friend go on a mission. Lori gets some surprising news.

programme.title: Chupacabra
programme.desc: Searching the woods alone, Daryl finds a clue but is badly injured and must face walkers and other dangers. Rick questions his choices. Glenn gets mixed signals from Maggie.

programme.title: Hansel and Gretel
programme.desc: In this modern retelling of the classic horror tale, teen siblings are enslaved by a psychotic recluse within her gruesome house of horrors in the woods.

programme.title: Lord of the Elves
programme.desc: In an ancient age, the peace-loving Hobbits are enslaved by the Java Men, a race of flesh-eating dragon-riders. The young Hobbit Goben must join forces with their neighbor giants, the humans, to free his people and vanquish their enemies.

programme.title: Sinister Squad
programme.desc: When a violent supernatural cult known as Death's Messengers reigns terror on Earth, a team of malevolent storybook villains is coerced into fighting in the modern world, but these baddies must learn to keep their true wickedness at bay if they want any chance at freedom.

programme.title: Titanic II
programme.desc: On the 100th anniversary of the original voyage, a modern luxury liner christened "Titanic II," follows the path of its namesake. But when a tsunami hurls an ice berg into the new ship's path, the passengers and crew must fight to avoid a similar fate.

programme.title: Trolland
programme.desc: Fenn the Troll hates the Troll pastime of pranking, and is teased so much for it that he runs away. But when a long-suffering park ranger starts capturing the other Trolls, it's up to Fenn to rescue his family and friends - without pranking.

programme.title: War of the Worlds
programme.desc: Astronomer George Herbert (C. Thomas Howell) is assigned to investigate reports of strange meteors crashing into earth near New York, Los Angeles and Washington, D.C. As the meteors land, enormous multi-limbed metal creatures disembark and begin destroying everything and everyone in their path with heat-ray guns. Amidst the apocalyptic destruction, Herbert teams with a soldier (Andy Lauer) and a pastor (Rhett Giles) on his journey into Washington to reunite with his family.

programme.title: Psychic Investigators, S1 E9 | Darryl Cozart
programme.desc: When a family man disappears one night after work, psychic Mary Ellen Rodrigues helps police by describing his murder to an officer who comes into her shop.

programme.title: Psychic Investigators, S1 E10 | Southern Organs Case
programme.desc: Dedicated psychic Robert Cracknell helps journalist Norman Luck track down two con men in Scotland who perpetrated a fraud involving church organs.

programme.title: Psychic Investigators, S1 E11 | Baton Rouge
programme.desc: In the search for a serial killer in Baton Rouge, Louisiana, police aren't impressed by psychic Jeanne Borgen's visions until one of the victims' neighbors reports seeing a peeping tom who could match her description of the killer.

programme.title: Psychic Investigators, S1 E12 | Jacqueline Poole
programme.desc: Psychic Christine Holohan helps police with clues to the death of young Jacqueline Poole, who was assaulted and strangled in her home.

programme.title: Weird or What? with William Shatner | Marathon Edition
programme.desc: From medical oddities to abnormal natural disasters to puzzling disappearances,this investigative series delves into all manner of mysteries.

programme.title: Meteorite Men, S3 E5 | Homestead
programme.desc: The METEORITE MEN setout to uncover a forgotten extraterrestrial treasure from the cornfields of Amana, Iowa. On February 12, 1875 the legendary “detonating space rock” hurled through the air and exploded six times over the farm fields of Iowa.

programme.title: Meteorite Men, S3 E6 | Return to Whitecourt
programme.desc: An important scientific mission summons the METEORITE MEN back to Canada.

programme.title: Meteorite Men, S3 E7 | Mojave
programme.desc: Geoff and Steve venture to one of the country’s meteorite capitals: Arizona, home of over 93 different space rocks. To better understand this phenomenon, the guys investigate the Mecca of meteorites, Franconia.

programme.title: DUST Collection | Horror
programme.desc: Science fiction is scary. These films prove that. Keep the lights on.

programme.title: If You Believe
programme.desc: A jaded book editor has nearly given up on happiness, until she bumps her head and gets a visit from her spunky younger self (Hayden Panettiere). Now, the cheerful, carefree seven-year old helps adult Susan rediscover her inner child.

programme.title: Blizzard
programme.desc: An enchanting tale of Katie and her magical friendship with Blizzard, one of Santa's newest reindeer. Blizzard uses her special powers to help Katie realize her own inner, strength and potential. By doing so Blizzard risks being banished from Santa's village -- only the most powerful gift of all can save them.

programme.title: Babes In Toyland (1997)
programme.desc: Featuring the voices of James Belushi, Lacey Chabert, Bronson Pinchot, Christopher Plummer and Charles Nelson Reilly, "Babes in Toyland" is a tale that will delight the entire family time and again. It's two days before Christmas, and the Toyland Toy Factory has just received its biggest order ever. But the evil Barnaby, who doesn't believe in toys, has plans to shut the factory down and spoil the holiday for everyone. Now it's up to Jack and Jill to stop Barnaby's plot and save Christmas!

programme.title: The Island with Bear Grylls
programme.desc: ''Episode 12'' -In this final episode, after five weeks on the island, the men are struggling to find enough to eat as the island's already depleted resources fail to deliver the coconuts and limpets that have become their staple diet. With energy levels at rock bottom, the island's oldest castaway - 58-year-old car salesman Phil - is forgotten when an unsatisfying watery fish broth is served for lunch. The oversight sees the men galvanize themselves to recapture their team spirit of old. The men decide that the only way to slow their physical decline is to put the last of their remaining energy into hunting for meat to eat. After a daring capture, the men feast on their first taste of meat in weeks, and their energy and spirits are revived. Finally, Bear Grylls arrives to bring the men back to civilization. In an emotional farewell, the men's last act is for web designer Kyle to finally extinguish the fire that he started 41 days ago.

programme.title: Tank Girl
programme.desc: In 2022, Earth is struck by a comet, leading to a massive drought. 11 years later a majority of the water left is kept in a reserve. Tank Girl (Lori Petty) is a member of a resistance group who steals whatever they want, by any means necessary. Being the enemies of the water reserve, their hideout is attacked, Tank Girl's boyfriend is killed and her friend Sam (Stacy Linn Ramsower) is captured! Now Tank Girl and her cohorts must break mega-villain Kesslee's (Malcolm McDowell) grip on the world.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation: Drive
programme.desc: Joey is going away for the weekend with his latest girlfriend, and Craig is surprised when Joey tells him he can stay on his own – and even have the guys over! When the guys get to Craig’s for the weekend, they can’t think of much to do – they’re bored. After a lame afternoon they’re raring to let loose - and what better way than by taking a drive?

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation: Shout, Pt. 1
programme.desc: The Degrassi Panthers have a new star soccer player, Spinner. His victory’s even sweeter when Paige agrees to a movie. When the losing team's defensive back, the gorgeous Dean, invites a smitten Paige to a house party, she cancels on Spinner.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation: Shout, Pt. 2
programme.desc: Haunted by memories of her recent sexual assault, Paige is desperately trying to appear normal. A girl band contest sounds like a great distraction. Terri wants to reunite PMS—including Ashley. Paige refuses, and recruits Hazel instead.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation: Mirror in the Bathroom
programme.desc: Toby is tired of being an invisible computer geek so he decides to join a sports team. Girls love wrestlers - that includes Toby’s crush Kendra. To Toby's dismay, the few extra pounds he carries put him in the same weight class as athletic Sean.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation: Take My Breath Away
programme.desc: Manny’s crush on Craig has reached huge proportions and everyone’s urging her to ask him out already! But Manny’s a romantic she thinks the guy ought to do the asking

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation: Don't Believe the Hype
programme.desc: Grade Nine International Day is coming up and Hazel isn’t thrilled. After all, Hazel’s Jamaican and everybody loves the islands - right? When the day arrives, Hazel’s display is a hit, but she isn’t acting like herself.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation: White Wedding, Pt. 1
programme.desc: Emma Nelson is reveling in her newest job as her mom's maid of honour and planner extraordinaire! Her mom, Spike, is marrying her high-school crush, Snake - who also just happens to be Emma's favourite teacher.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation: When Doves Cry, Pt. 1

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation: Karma Chameleon
programme.desc: Ashley feels like an outcast. Nobody's willing to forget how she treated them at her party last year. Ash decides to take action, swallows her pride and apologizes to everyone. And it works. She boasts to Terri about her success- it’s like last year never happened!

programme.title: Lucky Dog

programme.title: Allen Iverson Reminds Us Why He's The Best Dressed NBA Player Ever | Tunnel Takedown

In addition to discussing which NBA players were the best and worst dressed of the week, we take a look at some of A.I's past fits while in the league and discuss the influence he still has on current player's fashion. Iverson also tells stories about the backlash he received for not sticking to the NBA's former uniform dress code, plus more!

programme.title: James Harden's Cozy Fit Costs as Much as a New Car | Tunnel Takedown

programme.title: NikeStories vs Nick Engvall in a Sneaker Battle From Home! | #LIFEATCOMPLEX

In one corner we have Drew Hammell, also known as NikeStories, and in the other corner we have founder of "Sneaker History" and veteran writer in the sneaker blog space, Nick Engvall. These two go head to head in a versatile five round battle! We get to see some classic gems, we haven't seen in a while. Check it out for yourselves and let us know who won this battle!

programme.title: Josh Luber of StockX vs Charlotte Hornets Bismack Biyombo in a Sneaker Battle | #LIFEATCOMPLEX

In one corner he is the co-founder of one of the largest online sneaker marketplaces in the world, StockX's very own Josh Luber is here to battle! And in the other corner, he is the biggest competitor we've had so far, literally! Standing in at 6 foot 8 inches tall, center for the Charlotte Hornets, Bismak Biyombo is here to throw down in the sneaker gauntlet!

programme.title: Why Can't I Be Me? Around You

Followed for 8 years by filmmaker Harrod Blank (son of Les Blank), Rusty guides us through the aftermath of her transition. Interwoven with lively tales of gender non-conforming individuals on the art-car circuit, Blank's film is a sensitive and unpredictable love letter to people who fight to be unapologetically themselves.

programme.title: Culture Q

This innovative, weekly news series creatively features entertainment, pop culture, lifestyle and political news with wit and insightfully nuanced perspectives. Emphasizing the queer millieu, Culture Q stands to be the leading, weekly forum for boundary-pushing discussions and commentary. Hosted by digital news influencer pioneers, Shira Lazar and Andy Lalwani of the highly successful What's Trending, Culture Q will feature an ever-changing cavalcade of guests who help capture that X-factor which defines queer culture.

programme.title: MCMILLAN: Oaklahoma, Get Ready, Part Two

programme.title: Bowhunter TV: Breaking the Brown Bear Curse #1

programme.title: Uncharted Waters With Peter Miller S4:E1 "Peter travels to Grande Isle, Louisiana in search of Red Fish and Yellowfin Tuna."
programme.desc: Peter travels to Grande Isle, Louisiana in search of redfish and yellowfin tuna. Fishing the bays and behind shrimp boats. They are treated with a shark frenzy of epic proportions and enough drag pulling action to put the average person in traction…PART 1

programme.title: Uncharted Waters with Peter Miller S4:E2 "Peter travels to Louisiana targeting Yellowfin Tuna and will stop at nothing to find them."
programme.desc: Peter Travels to Louisiana obsessed with the Yellowfin Tuna bite he has heard so much about and won’t stop until sashimi is served. PART 2

programme.title: Uncharted Waters with Peter Miller S4:E3 "Peter and his daughter Emily, target Mahi Mahi, Peacock Bass, Largemouth Bass and Tarpon in Miami."
programme.desc: Peter and his daughter Emily catch Mahi Mahi offshore, Peacock and Largemouth Bass in their backyard and travel to downtown miami to catch Tarpon and are treated to an epic sashimi dinner at Uchi Miami with James Beard award winning chef, Tyson Cole.

programme.title: Midwest Whitetail Offseason S14:E7 "Deadly Setup: The Open Gate"
programme.desc: On this week's episode, we first join Bill as he takes down stands across the farm, inspecting them to make sure they're safe. One of the stands he made his way to was one of the deadliest stands on the entire farm, the "Open Gate." Bill goes into detail on why this stand works so well and relives two successful hunts. Then we join Josh Honeycutt in Kentucky, who gives us an update on how his off-season has been going and introduces his plans to catch up with his top targets this coming fall.

programme.title: Midwest Whitetail Offseason S14:E8 "October Cold Fronts, Kubota RTV X1100C Review"
programme.desc: On this week's episode, we start out by focusing on the early season. We take a look at examples of when it can be great hunting and more importantly, why. Josh Sparks highlights a hunt for a Big 10 he had last October, touching on what he learned and what he would do different, put in the same situation. Next, we join Louie Clouse, on a very similar hunt from 2016, but his hunt ends with a great buck on the ground. Then, we join Bill who introduces the Kubota RTV X1100C he recently was sent to test, discussing why it's such a great option for someone looking to acheive work on their farm. Finally, we join Ben Hampton as he shares his family's favorite venison stroganoff recipe.

programme.title: The "Off-Season" S1:E6 "240 pt. 2"
programme.desc: With a run down and overgrown property that was once for sale, now ours... it's time to get to work. This land is sort of a "blank canvas" with so much potential for my son and I. with the thick bedding cover and an abundance of water sources already present, the sky is the limit once we add food and give the wildlife the security they need... It is now time to turn this 300 acres into a land manager's and die hard hunter's dream!

programme.title: The "Off-Season" S1:E7 "Tree Management"
programme.desc: When people think of creating food sources on their property for deer and other wildlife, the first thing that comes to mind are food plots. While these can produce a high volume of palatable forage, another great option is to plant trees. A variety of soft and hard mass orchards, if cared for properly, can provide another great source of nutrition year round, taking the quality of deer on your property to the next level!

programme.title: The "Off-Season" S1:E8 "Plantation Story"
programme.desc: Every year we try to incorporate new projects to drastically change the quality of habitat we have on the farm for our wildlife. A couple of years ago that project was to create a small hunting plot in the middle of a heavily wooded area in one of our prime hunting locations. This project has turned into what we now call “The Plantation Plot”. As a deer manager creating habitat for the wildlife is one of the most rewarding things you can do. In previous episodes, we went over things like what to do prior to planting, annual vs perennial plots, and even breaking down brand new property. But in this episode we will come full circle, and apply all of those concepts, to create a successful food plot from scratch.

programme.title: The "Off-Season" S1:E9 "Frost Seeding"
programme.desc: Frost Seeding. It's a practice commonly overlooked, but when done correctly can produce major results at a time when wildlife need it the most! And with very little equipment required, this method of establishing food plots is perfect for just about anyone!

programme.title: The "Off-Season" S1:E10 "Trapping"
programme.desc: In the previous episodes of The “Off-Season”, we have talked about creating food sources and building habitat for the wildlife on your property. While these areas of land management are crucial, a successful land manager must also keep their eye on the predator population. Animals such as coyotes, raccoons, and fisher, as well as fox and possums, all prey on either young turkeys or young deer, making it important to control their numbers in order to have the best hunting opportunities.

programme.title: Fly Rod Chronicles S17:E7 "Grandslam on the Fly at Yellow Creek"
programme.desc: Curtis and Autumn travels to Yellow Creek Trout Club in pursuit of a grandslam during the 17 year Cicada brood hatch. During the pursuit Autumn hads back to college and Curtis lands an IGFA Trout Grandslam with his buddy Steven Renosky, owner of Yellow Creek Trout Club

programme.title: Fly Rod Chronicles S17:E8 "Curtis & the Family takes on the New River"
programme.desc: Curtis and his family head down to southern West Virginia to visit the 2nd oldest river in the world the New River. As Curtis and Autumn sneaks in a little fishing the rest of the family hangs out with River Expeditions and gets into some crazy adventures like Ziplining, Paddleboarding, Hiking, and of course Whitewater Rafting. Watch as the Fleming family has an amazing time in there home state of Beautiful West Virginia!

programme.title: Sweetwater S7:E7 "Power Polling South Bay"
programme.desc: Miles and Joey take Power Pole's Curt Hill fishing in the south Bay of Lake Okeechobee.

programme.title: Sweetwater S7:E8 "Sweetwater Challenge 2"
programme.desc: Miles and Joey go head to head in another Sweetwater Challenge. Who can land more fish and bag the big kicker for the day on Lake Okeechobee!?

programme.title: Limitless S1:E4 "Lake Eufala"
programme.desc: We head to arguably the most historic bass fishing location on the planet, Lake Eufaula! this place is known for big fish and is rich with history. This is the place where a lot of famous fishing lures were even created, including the deep diving crankbait and big worm. Anyways, it was a super fun tournament. I went fishing shallow and also played in some offshore brush. Watch it go down!

programme.title: Limitless S1:E1 "Lake Okeechobee - MLF Pro Circuit"
programme.desc: It's the beginning of a New Year and we kick off the season at the Historic Lake Okeechobee. Join me as I try to get the year started off right on the Major League Fishing Pro Circuit. Things don't always go as planned in this sport, but that is why we love it! Adversity is the name of the game sometimes, and we have to react accordingly! Let's get it started and go catch some bass!

programme.title: Breaking Boundaries S7:E4 - "Crankbait Largemouth Bass"
programme.desc: JP breaks down the finer points of fishing weed in the North using a crankbait to target Largemouth Bass.

programme.title: Breaking Boundaries S7:E5 - "Pre Winter Walleye"

programme.title: Backcountry Traditions S2:E1 "Alaska Part 1"

programme.desc: In a sandwich, every component plays a role. With a supporting cast of fixin’s, and Frankie’s cost-saving homemade twists, these sandwiches just might steal the show.

programme.title: Struggle Meals
programme.desc: Reaching textural nirvana is never easy, but Frankie explores several ways to achieve the perfect crunch in his dishes, both savory and sweet. Add this elusive element to your recipes without adding cost to your budget.

programme.title: Struggle Meals
programme.desc: Summer is coming to a close but there’s still a bounty of fresh, seasonal produce to enjoy. Celebrate with Frankie as he makes some of his favorite cookout classics that’ll take you from a weekend picnic to a backyard BBQ, with or without a grill.

programme.title: Struggle Meals
programme.desc: Frankie is all about BYOL - bring your own lunch. It’s not only good for your wallet, it’s good for your health. Skip the vending machine and the cafeteria in favor of creative, cost effective and easy-to-transport midday meals.

programme.title: Struggle Meals
programme.desc: Amp up your salad game with a little mixing and matching, from light and leafy greens to crisp and hearty toppings, and dressings for all occasions. Frankie shows us how versatile and fulfilling a homemade salad can truly be.

programme.title: Struggle Meals

programme.title: Simple Soups
programme.desc: Most cooks are under the impression that good soup takes all day to prepare. Maybe that's what our mothers wanted us to think, but the truth is that homemade soup need not be a complicated affair. We'll show you how to make simplified versions of two favorite soups: chicken noodle and Italian pasta and bean.

programme.title: Four-Star Desserts
programme.desc: Watch as we take chocolate volcano cake and caramelized pears and make them approachable for the home cook.

programme.title: German Chocolate Cake
programme.desc: German chocolate cake-filled with sticky pecans and coconut, and left au naturel on the sides-is not without flaws. The filling can be sticky, sodden, and excessively sweet, and the cake itself is often weak on chocolate flavor. We set out to develop a German chocolate cake that avoids these pitfalls and delivers on its promise.

programme.title: Paella Party
programme.desc: One of our favorite Spanish dishes is paella, a saffron-spiced rice dish. But with a lengthy ingredient list including six kinds of seafood, three meats, and seven vegetables, the shopping alone can give the home cook pause. We take a hard look at paella and see if we can pare back this dish to its humble origins without losing its alluring flavors.

programme.title: Best Beef Stew
programme.desc: Beef, beer, and onions have a natural affinity-it's one reason burgers and onion rings are on the menu at nearly every sports bar. In a carbonnade, the heartiness of beef melds with the soft sweetness of sliced onions in a lightly thickened broth that is rich, deep, and satisfying. We aimed to create the very best version of this cold-weather favorite.

programme.title: Even More Italian Classics
programme.desc: Just when we think we've become familiar with every Italian dish under the sun, we're pleasantly surprised to come across one we've somehow overlooked-Spaghetti with Marinara Sauce.

programme.title: Aloha State Favorites
programme.desc: Test cook Bryan Roof prepares Hawaiian-Style Fried Chicken with host Bridget Lancaster. Next, equipment expert Adam Ried reviews plastic wrap with host Julia Collin Davison. Then, tasting expert Jack Bishop challenges Bridget to a tasting of potato chips. Finally, test cook Natalie Estrada makes Julia an Aloha State favorite, Hawaiian Macaroni Salad.

programme.title: Texas Barbecue Brisket
programme.desc: Test cook Bryan Roof makes host Julia Collin Davison a tender and delicious Texas Barbecue Brisket. Then, equipment expert Adam Ried shows host Bridget Lancaster his top pick of coolers.

programme.title: BBQ Thighs and Fried Peach Pies
programme.desc: Julia Collin Davison unveils the secrets to the ultimate Barbecue Chicken Thighs to host, Bridget Lancaster. Then, tasting expert Jack Bishop challenges Bridget to a tasting of popcorn. And finally, test cook Bryan Roof demonstrates how to make Fried Peach Pies at home.

programme.title: Smoky Barbecue Favorites
programme.desc: Test cook Ashley Moore shows host Bridget Lancaster how to tackle Texas-sized, Thick Cut Smoked Pork Chops. Then, equipment expert Adam Ried reveals his pick for dry measuring cups. Finally, Julia Collin Davison reveals the secret to achieving the perfect Backyard Barbecue Beans.

programme.title: Holiday Roast and Potatoes
programme.desc: Hosts Bridget Lancaster and Julia Collin Davison streamline a classic recipe for Boneless Rib Roast with Yorkshire Pudding and Jus. Then, tasting expert Jack Bishop challenges Bridget to a tasting of black tea. And finally, test cook Ashley Moore makes Bridget a family-favorite recipe for Lighthouse Inn Potatoes.

programme.title: Tristate Treats
programme.desc: Hosts Julia Collin Davison and Bridget Lancaster make the ultimate New Jersey Crumb Buns. Then, equipment expert Adam Ried reviews nonstick skillets. And finally, test cook Lan Lam makes Julia a streamlined recipe for Cheese Blintzes with Raspberry Sauce.

programme.title: Autumn Desserts
programme.desc: Host Bridget Lancaster goes into the test kitchen with host Julia Collin Davison to learn how to make the ultimate Chewy Oatmeal Cookies. Then, equipment expert Adam Ried reviews mini prep bowls in the Equipment Corner. Finally, test cook Elle Simone reveals the secrets to Ultranutty Pecan Bars.

programme.title: Flavorful Italian Favorites
programme.desc: Host Bridget Lancaster shows host Julia Collin Davison how to make perfect Cheese and Tomato Lasagna. Next, tasting expert Jack Bishop challenges Julia to a tasting of jarred anchovies. Finally, test cook Keith Dresser uncovers the secrets to Really Good Garlic Bread.

programme.title: Grown Up Comfort Classics
programme.desc: Hosts Bridget Lancaster and Julia Collin Davison unlock the secrets to Simple Stovetop Macaroni and Cheese. Science expert Dan Souza explains the proper way to use a whisk. In the Equipment Corner, expert Adam Ried reveals his top pick for large saucepans. Next, test cook Becky Hays makes the perfect Turkey Meatloaf with Ketchup-Brown Sugar Glaze. Finally, gadget critic Lisa McManus reviews lid holders.

programme.title: Summer Cookout
programme.desc: Test cook Dan Souza makes host Julia Collin Davison perfect Spice-Rubbed Chicken Drumsticks on the grill. Then, equipment expert Adam Ried reveals his top pick for Baking Peels. Finally, test cook Erin McMurrer makes host Bridget Lancaster the ultimate New England Baked Beans.

programme.title: Chicken and Biscuits
programme.desc: Test cook Becky Hays and host Julia Collin Davison make the perfect Indoor Pulled Chicken with Sweet and Tangy Barbecue Sauce. Tasting expert Jack Bishop conducts a tasting of basmati rice, gadget critic Lisa McManus reviews the gadgets you didn't know you needed, and test cook Erin McMurrer unlocks the secrets to making Ultimate Flaky Buttermilk Biscuits at home.

programme.title: Lidia's Italian Table - Bistecca Fiorentina
programme.desc: Italians are not big beef eaters. When they do indulge, it is rarely with steak…except in Florence, where Bistecca Fiorentina is a favorite. At 2” thick, grilled over coals, with a very special anchovy, rosemary and salt rub, it is served with braised cannellini beans. Caramelized tomatoes (yes!) over vanilla ice cream for dessert it’s a rich and robust dessert after Bistecca!

programme.title: Michael Chiarello's Napa - Winter Favorites
programme.desc: When the temperature drops, foods should deepen in flavor. These are the dishes we make when it's cold outside. A Chicken Bolognaise that's lower in fat than the traditional version, Fennel Roasted Vegetables, and a cheesecake made with flavorful mascarpone.

programme.title: Primal Grill - Out Of Africa
programme.desc: The focus is on Africa where live fire cooking began. Recipes include: Piri Piri Wings, Cape Malay Sosaties and Kenyan Lamb.

programme.title: Martin Yan's Chinatowns - Mr. Fish Head
programme.desc: Martin visits Damenlou or “Big Door” restaurant, the haunt of Singapore’s legendary and beloved character, Mr. Fish Head. This episode's recipes include: Singapore’s Fish Head Soup and Family-Style Fish with Bean Sprouts.

programme.title: Ciao Italia - Something Special / Qualcosa di Speciale
programme.desc: Mary Ann visits her good friend, Executive Chef Michele Rabazzi, whose homemade pasta technique is a wonder to behold. In this case he creates one of his restaurant’s favorite primos Tagliatelle with Basil Pesto. Michele steps up his game by having Mary Ann help him prepare a delicate Strudel with Saffron Sauce that is a thing of beauty.

programme.title: Nick Stellino: Storyteller in the Kitchen - Bacon or Pancetta
programme.desc: Chef Stellino attempts to answer the age old question - which is better - bacon or pancetta? Dishes include: Ragu' Di Gamberetti/ Shrimp Amatriciana with Pasta / Insalata Del Sogno / Watermelon Salad with Tomato and Bacon.

programme.title: The Kitchen Wisdom of Cecilia Chiang - Passing On The Wisdom
programme.desc: In this final episode, first they recreate a Mandarin classic dessert, glacéed bananas. Then Belinda does a b.patisserie signature favorite, her now famous chocolate banana almond croissant.

programme.title: From Scratch - Clambake
programme.desc: Today, Chef Joe is hunting for the best seafood and heads to the beach for a CLAMBAKE.

programme.title: Foodie Road Trip with Skye Estroff - Skye and the Tybeans of Tybee Island
programme.desc: Food Expert and Host, Skye the towns she has discovered to be "hidden gems." She'll talk with the locals, dine at their favorite restaurants and get their insider point of view. We'll share stories that connect people from all backgrounds and walks of life and gain a fresh new perspective. Whether it's Vidalia, GA, Galena, IN, or Corona Del Mar, CA...It's all happening on Foodie Road Trip.

programme.title: Whats For Dinner - Potato and Spinach Frittata
programme.desc: Ken and Mary Jo have a fun time in the kitchen cooking potato and spinach frittata, plus a few other excellent dishes.

programme.title: Justin Wilson's Easy Cookin' - Mashed Garlic Irish Potato Casserole & Baked Chicken
programme.desc: Join Justin as he demonstrates how to prepare and cook Mashed Garlic Irish Potato Casserole & Baked Chicken!

programme.title: Hawaii Cooks with Roy Yamaguchi - Mango Mania
programme.desc: Mangoes arrived in Hawaii in the early 1800s and have exploded into an important local crop with numerous varieties now readily available. Roy and guest chef Ronnie Nasuti of Roy’s Hawaii Kai take a tour of a unique mango farm that is growing exceptionally tasty mangoes while consistently experimenting with new varieties.

programme.title: Graham Kerr's Kitchen - Afghan Lamb Palow
Dine & Dish Nation - The Caucus Club Downtown Louie’s La Feria
programme.desc: Host Kam Carman welcomes Marci Shienbaum, Harris Van Cleef and Lutonia Johnson, who review delicious dishes at the Caucus Club, famous for launching Barbra Streisand’s career American staples at Downtown Louie’s Lounge, whose chefs competed in The James Beard Foundation's “Blended Burger Project” and Spanish Tapas and authentic recipes from Spain at La Feria.

programme.title: A Taste of History - The Experiment in Zoar
programme.desc: Chef Staib travels to the town of Zoar, Ohio, established by German separatists in the 19th century. He learns what can be accomplished with a strong sense of community, and prepares familiar recipes from his homeland such as spaetzle and gaisburger marsch.

programme.title: Martin Yan - Quick and Easy - Teahouse Delights
programme.desc: Martin visits a traditional Asian teahouse and learns about the delicacies they serve. Back in his studio kitchen, Martin puts his new-found knowledge to work and cooks these quick and easy dishes.

programme.title: Superfoods with Chef Walter Staib - Dark Green Vegetables
programme.desc: Chef Staib prepares Codfish filets with Wilted Spinach, Grilled Vegetable Napolean, and Broccoli Feta Salad.

programme.desc: From an indie musician in Mumbai to a skate community rallying together to help local children, Stephen finds the personal stories of art and perseverance in a community of 1.3 billion people.

programme.title: Chasing The Sun: Asia - South Korea

programme.title: Ask TOH | Bulkhead, Recirc Pumps
programme.desc: The twelfth season of Ask This Old House begins with Kevin teaching the guys how to use Twitter. Tom replaces an old, rusted bulkhead door. Richard discusses several ways to get hot water without waiting. And the guys ask "What Is It?"

programme.title: Ask TOH | Chili Peppers, Flange
programme.desc: Roger builds a garden bed for chile pepper plants in New Mexico. Richard repairs a leaky toilet with a worn out flange. And the guys ask "What Is It?"

programme.title: Ask TOH | No Hands Faucet, Drain
programme.desc: Richard replaces a leaking kitchen faucet with a new hands-free model. Kevin explains rechargeable batteries. Roger installs a channel drain in a driveway to divert rainwater. And the guys ask ""What Is It?"

programme.title: Ask TOH | Front Door, Container Garden
programme.desc: Tom visits Seattle where he helps a homeowner install a new, pre-hung front door. Richard discusses an important water heater safety device. Roger shows how to use big containers for screening and shading in a backyard. And the guys ask ""What Is It?"

programme.title: Ask TOH | Shade, Hybrid Heater
programme.desc: Kevin visits Santa Fe and explores the Santa Fe style of architecture. Then he installs a shade sail over a deck to cut down on sun exposure. Roger shows the proper way to use a wheelbarrow. And Richard installs a hybrid water heater that saves energy.

programme.title: Ask TOH | Leaky Skylight, Noisy Toilet
programme.desc: Tommy and Kevin replace a leaky skylight. Richard repairs a noisy toilet. And the guys ask ""What Is It?"

programme.title: Ask TOH | Tree, Basement Drain
programme.desc: Roger and a homeowner plant a maple tree. Richard heads to Indianapolis to begin work on a new master bathroom in a basement. And the guys ask What Is It?

programme.title: Ask TOH | Severe Weather Prep
programme.desc: "In this special episode, Richard visits Oklahoma to install a safe room for tornado protection. Tom visits a lab to test different hurricane window protection. Kevin and electrician Scott Caron install a whole-house standby generator. And meteorologist Jim Cantore stops by to share his insights on how weather is changing and what homeowners can do to prepare.

programme.title: Ask TOH | Routers, Frozen AC
programme.desc: Tom demonstrates many uses for a router. Richard replaces an air conditioning unit that freezes when it runs. And the guys ask ""What Is It?"

programme.title: Ask TOH | Irrigation, Heat Pump
programme.desc: Roger visits New Mexico to install an irrigation system designed to work in a desert climate. Richard installs a new style of heat-pump water heater. Tom shares a viewer tip about re-using an old garden hose reel. And the guys ask ""What Is It?"

programme.title: Ask TOH | Crown Molding, Post
programme.desc: Tom heads to Seattle to install crown molding. Roger replaces a rotted fence post. Kevin explains the difference between cement, concrete, and mortar. And the guys ask ""What Is It?"

programme.title: Ask TOH | Humidifier, Smoke and Carbon Monoxide
programme.desc: Richard visits Charlotte, NC to install a whole-house humidifier. Kevin and electrician Scott Caron install hardwired smoke and carbon monoxide detectors for a young family in Indianapolis. Tom shows how to remove stripped screws. And the guys ask ""What Is It?"

programme.title: Ask TOH | Zoning, Desert Garden
programme.desc: Roger visits Santa Fe to learn about ""waffle gardening,"" a method of growing vegetables in an arid climate. Richard adds motorized zone dampers to a forced-air heating & cooling system. Then Tom shows an easy way to bisect angles. And the guys ask ""What Is It?"

programme.title: Ask TOH | Post Rot, Dehumidifier
programme.desc: Tom repairs a rotted porch post. Richard visits New Orleans to help a family deal with high indoor humidity. And the guys ask ""What Is It?"

programme.title: Ask TOH | Box Spring, Light Switch
Ask TOH | Fire Ladder, Clawfoot Tub
programme.desc: Richard visits a historic home in Mobile, Alabama and installs a clawfoot tub with shower. Tom installs a permanent fire escape ladder in a bedroom. Roger shows the best way to prune trees. And the guys ask ""What Is It?"

programme.title: Ask TOH | Greenhouse, Pendant Light
programme.desc: Roger visits Biloxi, Mississippi where he builds a high tunnel greenhouse with a homeowner. Richard explains the best types of pliers and wrenches. Electrician Scott Caron converts three recessed lights into three pendants in a kitchen. And the guys ask ""What Is It?"

programme.title: The Locator: A Mother's Healing
programme.desc: Mary Radcliff and her husband took in a neglected two-year old girl, Tamisha. They were one big happy family until, without warning, Social Services took Tamisha out of the home she'd known for five years.

programme.title: The Locator: A Mother's Regrets
programme.desc: Shelly Hodson was abandoned at age 8, following her parents' bitter divorce. Now a married mother of two, she challenges Troy to find her mother, using only her memories and a first name as clues.

programme.title: The Locator: A Daughter's Two Dads
programme.desc: David turns to Troy after his desperate search for his daughter Christa's biological father comes up short. Christa worries about rejection, and must take a DNA test before proceeding.

programme.title: The Locator: A Mother's Secret & A Picture Is Worth A Thousand Words
programme.desc: Dawn reaches out to Troy in the hopes that he can finally bring her some closure regarding her father's disappearance. Maren will stop at nothing to find her mother's first born child.

programme.title: The Locator: Righting A Wrong
programme.desc: Nikki discovers that her Dad is not, in fact, her biological father, and contacts Troy in the hopes that he can find her birth father.

programme.title: The Locator: A Life Comes Full Circle
programme.desc: When Tiffanie Canada lost both of her parents, Debra Russ was the first to step in to give her a home. Now, Tiffanie wants to repay Debra by re-uniting her with her biological daughter.

programme.title: The Locator: My Two Dads
programme.desc: Elaine Romero suffered a tragic loss when her father took his own life in their family home, leaving behind no explanation. She is now looking for her dad's best friend, in the hopes that he has some of the answers she needs.

programme.title: The Locator: Separated But Not Forgotten

programme.desc: "Season 2, Day Eight" - With just four chefs remaining, the competition becomes fierce. Who among them has what it takes to be head chef at Gordon Ramsay's new restaurant?

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: "Season 2, Day Nine" - The contestants taste Chef Ramsay's signature dish and are given twenty minutes to replicate it. Tensions rise amongst the chefs amidst accusations of cheating.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: "Season 2, Day Ten (Part One)" - From the menu to the décor, the two finalists must prove their worth by running their own restaurants. Both will complete a dinner service with help from their former competitors.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: "Season 2, Day Ten (Part Two)" - In the season finale, the final two contestants prepare one last dinner service for Chef Ramsay.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: "Season 3, Day One" - Tyrannical chef Gordon Ramsay returns for a third summer to tutor and torture aspiring chefs. The winner will receive a job as head chef at Nevada's Green Valley Ranch resort.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: "Season 3, Day Two" - The two teams face off in a food-prep challenge that rewards the winners with a chance to spend time with Chef Ramsay away from the kitchen.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: "Season 3, Day Three" - Chef Ramsay orders the remaining contestants to cook breakfast for visiting service members. The winning team will receive a day of rest, and the losers get kitchen patrol duty.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: "Season 3, Day Four" - On the fourth day, the remaining chefs compete in a blindfold taste test. The losers must accept a difficult punishment while the winners dine with Chef Ramsay.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares: Sabatiello's
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay visits Sabatiello's and finds a hot-headed owner who is deep in debt. The owner gets so angry at his employees and Ramsay's criticism that he shuts down the eatery himself.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares: Cafe Tavolini
programme.desc: While in Bridgeport, Connecticut, Chef Ramsay pays Cafe Tavolini a visit. Two lackadaisical owners watch as their eatery goes south.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares: Fine McCool's
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay visits the family-run Finn McCool's in Westhampton, New York and faces an obnoxious head chef who happens to be the owner's son.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares: The Mixing Bowl
programme.desc: Located in Bellmore, New York, The Mixing Bowl faces an influx of competition and barely has customers. Chef Ramsay strives to correct problems with the restaurant's appearance and menu.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares: Seascape
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay must work with a hard-headed chef and inexperienced owners to make some changes and bring customers back to Seascape.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares: Peter's
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay visits Peter's, a family-run Italian restaurant in Babylon, New York. He discovers that the eatery is sinking because of its brash manager and co-owner.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares: The Olde Stone Mill
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay travels to The Olde Stone Mill in Tuckahoe, New York. Although the front has been renovated, the kitchen still serves less-than-stellar food.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares: Dillon's
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay is in the Big Apple to revamp Dillon's, an Indian restaurant just blocks away from his own thriving eatery. Stubborn owner Mohammed loses approximately $25,000-$50,000 a month.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares: Handlebar
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay visits Mount Sinai, New York to help spruce up Bill and Carolyn LeRoy's Handlebar restaurant and lounge, which looks like it's stuck in the 1980s.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares: Trobiano's
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay tries to help Italian restaurant Trobiano's. When Ramsay confronts the owner about the cleanliness of the kitchen and the tastiness of the food, tensions rise.

programme.desc: "Cuando su familia se muda de una bulliciosa ciudad a una vieja casa en los suburbios, solo Oliver puede ver el espíritu de Clive Rutledge, el propietario anterior. Clive hace todo tipo de destrozos para obligar a Oliver y a su familia a que se vayan. Oliver asume el desafío con la ayuda de un amable vecino, quien ayuda a Clive a superar sus penas terrenales."

programme.title: The Three Musketeers EP01
programme.desc: While visiting the Qing Dynasty, Park Ji-won finds an old book titled "The Memoirs of Park Dal-hyang." Dal-hyang, the book's main character, heads to Hanyang, hoping to pass the military exam to marry his first love. Then, he encounters three men calling themselves "The Three Musketeers.

programme.title: The Three Musketeers EP02
programme.desc: Given a special pardon for his mistake from Crown Prince, Dal-hyang passes the exam. Then, his first love, Kangbin, secretly visits him. Meanwhile, Seung-po and Min-seo witness an unexpected incident when they are at the pub to congratulate Dal-hyang.

programme.title: The Three Musketeers EP03
programme.desc: Crown Prince Sohyun, shocked after seeing Mi-ryung alive, orders to reinvestigate her death. Meanwhile, Dal-hyang officially becomes the officer of the state and finds an unexpected guest.

programme.title: In Need of Romance S1 EP01
programme.desc: Sunwoo In-young, the manager of the hotel concierge, was disappointed that her boyfriend Kim Sung-soo had not told her his debut as a movie director. In fact, while they have been agonizing over their romance these days, Yoon Kang-hee, the heroine of Sung-soo's movie, brought drunk Sung-soo to In-young's house a few days later.

programme.title: In Need of Romance S1 EP02
programme.desc: After breaking up with Sung-soo, In-young leaves malicious comments when she sees articles about Sung-soo and Kang-hee's romantic relationship online. eanwhile, Seo-youn is shocked to see a man, who she had thought of marrying three months ago, comes to a restaurant with a pregnant woman. Hyun-joo is about to marry Tae-woo, but Tae-woo always refuses to go into her house. Hyun-joo gets to meet Duk-su who has come to her house for helping cleaing up.

programme.title: In Need of Romance S1 EP03
programme.desc: Hyun-joo hires Deok-soo as her one-day groom instead of Tae-woo, who is not coming. Meanwhile, In-young was hurt by Sung-soo that he bought a new house without saying a word. Looking at Sung-soo and Kang-hee, In-young senses the strange atmosphere of the two and gets depressed. Seo-youn accompanies Jun to an interview with a magazine, and she is surprised that the editor-in-chief she met is her EX-boyfriend's wife. The editor-in-chief said she would sue Seo-youn for adultery, who confessed that she had spent a night with her husband.

programme.title: In Need of Romance S1 EP04
programme.desc: In-young, Seo-yeon, and Hyun-joo fake their age and job and visit a club. At the Club, In-young meets her junior colleague Sung-hyun in the VIP room. Seo-yeon is embarrassed and tries to contact Jun, who quits his job after being disappointed by her adultery, but he is being cold. Meanwhile, Hyun-joo, who was desperately looking for her lost cat, encounters Duk-su in the neighborhood.

programme.title: Hwang Jin Yi
programme.desc: In an era when social class is more important than life. A woman chooses a life at society's lowest rungs.

programme.title: Oh My Ghost - s1 | e3 - Episode 3
programme.desc: Soon-ae is drawn to her father's restaurant and tries to help him by stealing supplies from Sun-woo's storage.

programme.title: Oh My Ghost - s1 | e4 - Episode 4
programme.desc: Bong-sun negotiates a deal with Sun-woo to stay at the restaurant for a few nights until she finds a new place, and Soon-ae discovers that Sun-woo is the man of vitality she's looking for.

programme.title: Oh My Ghost - s1 | e5 - Episode 5
programme.desc: Bong-sun refuses to let Soon-ae possess her again, and her persistence in driving away the ghost leads to a bit of an accident at the restaurant.

programme.title: Oh My Ghost - s1 | e6 - Episode 6
programme.desc: Back in Bong-sun's body, Soon-ae checks after her sickly father and begins to receive cooking lessons from Sun-woo.

programme.title: Oh My Ghost - s1 | e7 - Episode 7
programme.desc: Sun-woo gives Bong-sun personal cooking lessons, getting closer to her true shy self. Soon-ae battles the possibility of becoming an evil spirit and not fulfilling her wish in time.

programme.title: Oh My Ghost - s1 | e8 - Episode 8
programme.desc: With Bong-sun allowing Soon-ae to possess her, they try and get closer to Sung-woo on a camping trip he has planned for him and his employees.

programme.title: Oh My Ghost - s1 | e9 - Episode 9
programme.desc: Sung-jae's past is revealed while Bong-sun and Sun-woo go through their first days as an official couple.

programme.title: The Dude In Me
programme.desc: Pan-soo, a successful businessman in his 40s, is hit on the ground by a person falling from a building. Waking up, he finds himself in another body. Now Pan-soo has to be Dong- hyun, a high school student who gets bullied frequently. He finds out Dong-hyun tried to help a girl, Hyun-jung, and fell off the building. When he meets her mother, Mi-sun, he immediately knows that Hyun-jeong is his daughter. To get close to Hyun-jung, Pan-soo takes hard physical training with her.

programme.title: I'M LIVE: S1 E201
programme.desc: I'm LIVE presents the Music & Lyrics Special in celebration of its 4th anniversary! And the last guest of the special trilogy is the super-talented sibling duo AKMU. The two burst into the K-pop scene in 2013 through the competition program "K-Pop Star Season 2" and pleasantly surprised the public with their unrefined, pure musicality. After being crowned the winners of the season, they made their official debut in 2014 with the album, "PLAY." The elder brother, LEE CHANHYUK, is known for his exceptional songwriting skills, and the younger sister, LEE SUHYUN, is famous for her crystal clear voice, and together they exude a great synergy that makes them one-of-a-kind in the highly competitive K-pop scene. Then in 2015, the duo won the Best Pop Album at the prestigious Korean Music Awards and once again proved that they enjoy both critical acclaim and commercial appeal. They are on the 7th year of their debut and still touch listeners with their creative interpretations of everyday life stories. In this episode, AKMU performs "ALIEN," "DINOSAUR," "How Can I Love The Heartbreak, You're The One I Love," "LAST GOODBYE," and "GIVE LOVE" to showcase the lyrical beauty of their music. Tune in to I'm LIVE and meet these two talented siblings!

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: John Branyan - Demeaning of Life
programme.desc: John Branyan's comedy is smart and sarcastic in perfect proportions. This special features his perspective on why God made everyone stupid and his unparalleled Shakespearean take on The Three Little Pigs.

programme.title: Daren Streblow - Organic and Inorganic Life
programme.desc: Daren Streblow’s unique style of observational stand-up comedy has been entertaining hundreds-of-thousands of people throughout the United States and around the world since he first stepped on the stage in 1995. Daren headlines churches, fundraisers, corporate functions, and colleges all over North America. He’s a “humor opportunist” who is always looking for the comical side of life and how people live it. He takes topics that everyone can relate to and filters them through his unique lens where connecting A to B leads to a letter in the Greek alphabet or maybe salad dressing.

programme.title: Billy Anderson - America's Sweetheart
programme.desc: Born in Texas and raised in Augusta, Georgia ñ Billy Anderson is stand-up comedian currently living in Seattle, Washington. Heís been seen regionally at SketchFest Seattle, The Washington Comedy Festival, Bumbershoot and was a finalist in the 2016 Seattle International Comedy Competition. Outside of the Northwest, Billy has written for Cracked.Com, performed in SF Sketchfest, LaLaFest Los Angeles, the San Francisco International Comedy Competition and as of 2013 he has performed stand-up comedy in every US state. Billy was recently featured on Audibleís ìSounds Like Americaî hosted by Jackie Kashian and the syndicated program ìLaughsî on Fox television.

programme.title: Rik Roberts - Put Down the Sweet Tea
programme.desc: Rik Roberts brings a little bit of Nashville everywhere he goes. From quick bits about family and technology, to surprising stories about marriage and music – you’ll find something you can relate to. Growing up in Kentucky, he got his hands dirty working

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Matt Bergman - A Little Bit Balder Now
programme.desc: Matt Bergman talks about being bad at handhsakes, accidentally breaking into an elderly woman's house, and bombing as an opener for the Goo Goo Dolls with sharp and self-deprecating humor.

programme.title: David Dyer - Further Along Than Anyone Expected
programme.desc: David Dyer has been performing at stand-up at comedy clubs and corporate events for over twenty years. He’s worked with some of the best comics in the industry including Mike Birbiglia, Jim Breuer, and Lewis Black. He’s been a contributing writer to NBC’s Late Night with Jimmy Fallon and ABC’s Politically Incorrect. He’s a regular on the nationally syndicated Bob and Tom Show and often appears on the roster for their “Friends of The Bob and Tom Show” comedy tour. He’s the host of a new web series called Sidecar Sessions where he interviews guests who are sitting in the sidecar of his motorcycle as David pilots the bike around town. David also created and stars in another web series called Pillars with co-star, Kevin Yon. David became an on-call firefighter with Grand Rapids Township in Michigan….his wife is nervous.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Dylan Mandlsohn - Cruising America
programme.desc: Dylan Mandlsohn's special is full of travel stories and riffs on America through the eyes of a Canadian.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Jim Colliton - Please Take the Lunch
programme.desc: Fueling his comedy with stories from his suburban life, Jim Colliton jokes about shredding children's art work, cats with depression, and wanting to fly separate from his wife.

programme.title: Jay Stevens - Life is Hilarious
programme.desc: Jay Stevens has been a professional comedian for almost 20 years. Growing up, he was known as a hilarious outgoing character by friends, family, colleagues and those he would meet on a first encounter.

programme.title: Rodney Laney - Who is Rodney Laney?
programme.desc: Rodney Laney has completed pilots for Comedy Central, MTV, and A&E. He has been seen on HBO, FOX News Channel’s Red Eye, The Late Late Show on CBS, Comedy Central’s Premium Blend, comedy.tv on the HD channel, two appearances on Gotham Comedy Live AXSTV, and Live in Gotham VR. He has appeared at the prestigious Just for Laughs Comedy Festival Montreal and LOL Lounge TBS Presents A Very Funny Festival: Just for Laughs Chicago.

programme.title: Brandon Vestal - Who?
programme.desc: “Brandon Vestal’s low key, deeply personal and honest style has made him a fast favorite in the comedy world, a “Don’t Miss” for college audiences, and a club favorite. He puts on an amazing show and is a definite must see.”

programme.title: Cleto Rodriguez - Cleto is My Real Name
programme.desc: Rodriguez connects with audiences by relating everyday life experiences. Anything and everything is fair game, from marriage mishaps to the challenges of dieting. His comedy is high-energy, observational and hilarious with a brilliant Latino twist.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Matt Bergman - A Little Bit Balder Now
programme.desc: Matt Bergman talks about being bad at handhsakes, accidentally breaking into an elderly woman's house, and bombing as an opener for the Goo Goo Dolls with sharp and self-deprecating humor.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Joe Zimmerman - Captain Snuggle Pants
programme.desc: Joe Zimmerman grew up in Morgantown, West Virginia, and started his comedy career in North Carolina. While living in the South, his stand-up group the Beards of Comedy landed a record deal with Comedy Central Records.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Ricky Glore - Dad Bod
programme.desc: New dad Ricky Glore riffs on wife hacks, dogs dying in horror films, and impersonations of celebrities while reading nursery rhymes

programme.title: Jim Gaffigan: Quality Time
programme.desc: Jim Gaffigan is in top form for his 7th comedy special. The 4-time Grammy nominated comedian.

programme.desc: Craig reflects on who he his, his reasons for getting into comedy.

programme.title: RIFFTRAX - Final Justice
programme.desc: The stars of Mystery Science Theater 3000 bring their comedic riffing treatment to the classic film that put the “chubby Deputy Sheriff from Texas goes on an adventure in Malta” genre on the map! Join Mike, Kevin, and Bill for Final Justice!

programme.title: RIFFTRAX SHORT - Three Magic Words
programme.desc: Yes, Pork, the delicious substance we've been known to indulge in every now and then here at RiffTrax. And since we buy it using the titular Three Magic Words, we'll always know we've got the best pork. What are the Three Magic Words? Quality, freshness and flavor! Join Mike, Kevin and Bill as they are serenaded about the joys of quality, fresh, flavorful pork. Over...and over...and over again...

programme.title: RiffTrax Presents: Vacation Days
programme.desc: Come for the antics, tomfoolery, and mixups - and stay for a surprising change of heart. This feature is a parody and contains the original movie combined with a comedic commentary by Mary Jo and Bridget from RiffTrax.

programme.title: RIFFTRAX SHORT - Shake Hands With Danger
programme.desc: RiffTrax, the guys who make movies funny, bring their comedic riffing treatment to this safety short Shake Hands With Danger! Mike, Kevin and Bill have never shaken hands with Danger, but they did give Danger that "fist bump then explosion" thing, and then Danger called them all "Bro-seph."

programme.title: RiffTrax: Blood Theater
programme.desc: Every time the Blood Theatre has opened for business, someone has died. But this time, the most incompetent theater owner in town has a good feeling about his chances! This feature is a parody and contains the original movie combined with a comedic commentary by Mike, Kevin and Bill from RiffTrax (formerly of MST3K).

programme.title: RiffTrax Shorts: Act Your Age
programme.desc: A classic of the late '40's, "authority figure shames a student" genre, Act Your Age is a window into the soul... of Jim. Join Mike, Kevin and Bill for Act Your Age!

programme.title: RiffTrax: Rats - Night of Terror
programme.desc: The atom bombs have fallen, and morons are all that remains. This feature is a parody and contains the original movie combined with a comedic commentary by Mike, Kevin and Bill from RiffTrax & MST3K.

programme.title: RIFFTRAX - Voodoo Man
programme.desc: Mike, Kevin and Bill return to the loving (and needle tracked) arms of Bela Lugosi as Voodoo Man! This feature is a parody and contains the original movie combined with a comedic commentary by Mike, Kevin and Bill from RiffTrax (formerly of Mystery Science Theater 3000).

programme.title: RIFFTRAX - Swing Parade
programme.desc: RiffTrax, the guys who make movies funny, bring their comedic riffing treatment to this clasic movie featuring The Three Stooges. Join Mike, Kevin and Bill for Swing Parade!
